segments.text: I think the woman looks so serene drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is on, and water is pouring over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware of the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is stretching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is eagerly waiting below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting back; this is dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're risking it for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing, reflecting the light from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, everything is calm in the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the boy might slip and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom's apron is neat, contrasting the disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a typical kitchen mishap waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
